name: Clumsy Shots Colored
description:
DEMO AVAILABLE HERE (Opera GX): https://gxc.gg/games/6m0ny9/Clumsy-Shots-Colored/tracks/10f0540f-05a2-4d40-bea6-...

Jump and shoot, in this simple, yet challenging game!  Smash enemies with power-ups!

Game features:
  • Close-call system (rewarding for killing the enemies that are close to barrier)
  • Various power-ups
  • Various enemy shapes
  • Getting harder progressively
  • AI generated voice announcer
  • Support for mouse, keyboard, and gamepad
Full version features: Credits:

Programming, Art, Design by @AnnoyedParsley

Music and Sound Effects obtained from Envato Elements.

AI generated voice obtained from VoiceOverMaker.io
